name: VACCINATE HIM
description:
THANK YOU MATEU, FOR MAKING THIS GAME POSSIBLE!

A GAME MADE FOR MINI-JAM-97-SIMULATION

NOTE: THERE ARE MANY BUGS IN A GAME, THE ENEMY MAY SPAWN OR GETS OUTSIDE THE CELL BY ONE GRID (LET'S PRETEND IT TO BE DIFFICULTY REDUCTION AS IT IS MY FIRST GAME JAM)

FOLLOWING THE LIMITATION MOVEMENT IS LETHAL, YOU ARE THE CURSED HERO WHO HAVE TO DELIVER VACCINE TO INFECTED ENEMY AND PROTECT ALL THE HOSPITALS

objective: Open all the cells and Protect the hospital 

challenge: Make all the cells green

Instructions:

Use WASD to move

Every step you take the cell becomes green

Every 5 steps you move enemy will be spawned

WATCH OUT YOUR MOVEMENT METER

Every few seconds vaccine will be spawned from hospital

AVOID CELLS THAT YOUR ENEMY ENTERED

IF UNEXPECTEDLY ENTERED, TAKE VACCINE FROM HOSPITAL TO GET CURED

NOTE: WHEN YOU ARE IDLE, IF ENEMY STEPS ON YOUR GRID YOU WON'T GET INFECTION JUST MAKE SURE NOT TO STEP ON HIS PATH  

If enemy steps on hospital, you have to get to adjacent hospital cell to fix it within short period of time, does not works if you are infected

COLLECT VACCTINATION FROM HOSPITAL AND STEP TO ENEMY POSITION TO KILL HIM

you can get outside of any cells by only 1 grid(BUG)

DON'T LET YOUR ENEMY TO SPREAD INFECTION TO ALL CELLS
